segments.text: Peeking into this scene, I see the kitchen layout clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is polishing her dish carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet runs, overflowing the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down to the floor in a puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't react, foot already wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the two-step stool reaches high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is in the cookie jar, grabbing goodies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other hand holds a plate awkwardly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts precariously, legs splayed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, arm raised expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She waits for him to share a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window frames a calm garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad how unaware they all are of the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Slippery floors and tipping stools spell trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
